'''"A Portrait of Paimon, the Greatest Companion"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "A Portrait of Paimon, the Greatest Companion" is obtainable from [[The Shadows Deepen]] Quest during the [[Event]], "[[Shadows Amidst Snowstorms]]".
